application.name: iContact
application.description:
iContact
A new implementation of iContact by supbro building on the source code release by Larna, with aditional features including Full screen, and a top bar based on A_Cs S2 series.

Check http://www.supware.net/iContact for more info!

Release Notes:

0.72 - June 9, 2008
  • Restored scroll bar for logs & favorites
  • Sped up display of favorites list
  • Updated icons to look more iPhone-like
  • Added better support for different screen sizes
  • Added more skin settings
  • Added more language strings
  • Added "alphabet" support for keyboard
  • Separated language from skin settings
  • Fixed start menu location for non-english
  • Fixed "gt;500" bug
  • Reduced memory footprint (for those with fewer contacts)
  • Optimized keyboard drawing routine *a little bit*
  • Changed animation effect for details screen
  • Fixed edit contact to go directly to edit screen
  • Fixed Favorites toggle to not delete other categories
  • Added Home2 and Work2 telephone numbers to details
